revision.comment: /* top */ clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Seagate NAS 2-Bay |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = https://www.seagate.com/support/network-attached-storage/business-storage/seagate-nas/ |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Seagate |model = NAS |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = 2-Bay |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = SRPD20 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = NAS |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F6707;ARMADA 370; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM v7 |cpu1_type_rev = (PJ4 core) |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz <!-- 800 MHz / 1.0 / 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SK hynix;H27U2G8F2CTR-BC; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC256M8FN-D1; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1518; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:10:75
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot; |stockos = Linux;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, SATA II, |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 2 |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 4 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = I2C Real Time Clock;Microchip Technology;MCP7940N;;1; ,,, PCIe to 2-port USB 3.1 Bridge;ASMedia Technology;ASM1042A;;1; ,,, 0.8A Low Dropout Regulator;Analog Integrations Corporation;AIC1117;;1; ,,, 2A Linear Power, Low Dropout Regulator;uPI Semiconductor;uP0105;;1; ,,, 30V, 13A P-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDS6679AZ;;1; ,,, 30V HEXFET Power MOSFET;International Rectifier;IRF8707;;2; ,,, 30V HEXFET Power MOSFET;International Rectifier;IFR8714;;1; ,,, Field Programmable DSP Switcher;Marvell;G47B;;1; ,,, Current Limited Power Distribution Switch;Texas Instruments;TPS2065C;;1; ,,, |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Debian,
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 07/2014 |estprice = 199 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00LM6LOHO |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "DART-2BAY-4BAY" and "V2.0" are silkscreened on the main board.
==Links of Interest== *[https://wiki.debian.org/InstallingDebianOn/Seagate/PersonalCloud Install Debian]
===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/nas/nas-reviews/32482-seagate-nas-family-reviewed On '''SmallNetBuilder'''] (dated Jul. 2014) *[https://www.pcmag.com/article2/0,2817,2470943,00.asp On '''PC Magazine'''] (dated Oct. 2014) *[http://www.storagereview.com/seagate_nas_2bay_review On '''StorageReview'''] (dated Aug. 2014)
